articles.title: Italy's Samantha Cristoforetti to be first European woman to command International Space Station - Wanted In Milan
articles.description:
Italy's first woman in space makes history again.
Italian astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti will become the first European woman to command the International Space Station (ISS) in 2022.
